Name: Magical Miri
About the game: Magical Miri is a 2D side scroller platform video game in anime style and with a little fan service . It tells the story of Miri, a magic apprentice who is trying to prevent a possible war between dimensions. To achieve it, she must travel to 5 different kingdoms to beat the most powerful sorceresses and get their magic crystals that will grant her access to the Supreme Academy of Magic, where she’ll find a big surprise. Estudio Roxis is a company of two guys having fun creating video games. As gamers and anime followers, we wanted to create a video game with an anime style, good gameplay, NES difficulty style level, fun to play, catchy soundtrack and endearing characters. Inspired by classics like Ghost 'n Goblins, Castlevania, and Mega Man , here is what we've achieved, we hope you enjoy playing it as we enjoyed creating it.         FEATURES Full controller support. All original characters and art. A powerful original sound track. Non linear progression. 25+ different enemies. 5+ tough mini bosses to defeat. 5+ beautiful bosses to beat. ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°) Original vocal sounds. Perks system. Puzzle mini games. Unlockable profiles. Two endings. Extremely fragile clothes. ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
